scheme_name: Incentive Scheme for Meritorious Students of Economically Backward Class of General Category
sub_categories: Education and training grants, fellowship, stipend
brief_description: Under this scheme, a one-time financial assistance of ₹15,000/- along with a certificate of appreciation is awarded to top 100 meritorious students of Class 10 & each stream of Class 12, who are listed in state-level merit list of Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education, Ajmer.
detailed_description: The &quot;Incentive Scheme for Meritorious Students of Economically Backward Class of General Category&quot; was launched by the Education Department, Government of Rajasthan. Under this scheme, a one-time financial assistance of ₹15,000/- along with a certificate of appreciation is awarded to the top 100 meritorious students of Class 10 and each stream (Science, Commerce, Arts) of Class 12, who are listed in the state-level merit list of the Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education (RBSE), Ajmer. The scheme is implemented by the Directorate of Secondary Education, Rajasthan, Bikaner.
benefits: One-time financial assistance of ₹15,000/- is provided to economically backward students from the general category studying in government and private schools. Certificate of Appreciation: An official certificate is awarded along with the monetary benefit.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a native of Rajasthan. The applicant should be a student. The applicant should belong to the economically backward class from the general category. The applicant should be studying in a government or private school. The applicant should have passed Class 10 th , Praveshika, Class 12 th (Science/Commerce/Arts), or Varishta Upadhyay examination conducted by Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education (RBSE), Ajmer. The applicant should have secured a minimum of 75% marks in the qualifying examination. The applicant's parents' combined annual income from all sources should be less than ₹2,50,000.

steps: Application Process: Step 1: To avail of the benefits of the scheme, students should fill out the online application form through the institution head (principal) of their respective school. Step 2: Eligible students are identified by the head of their institution. Step 3: Submit copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attested, if required) to the respective school. Step 4: The school will visit the Shala Darpan, Rajasthan Portal. Step 5: Using the school's login credentials (Login ID and Password), the school will fill and submit the application form. Post-Application Process: Step 1: The institution head forwards the online application to the concerned District Education Officer (DEO) Headquarters (Primary/Secondary Education). Step 2: The District Education Officer compiles and forwards the verified applications of all eligible students from the district to the Directorate of Secondary Education, Rajasthan, Bikaner. Step 3: Post-verification, the incentive amount is disbursed to the students' bank accounts.

documents_required: Aadhaar Card or Jan Aadhaar Card of the Student Marksheet Copy Income Certificate /EWS certificate Any other documents as required
